alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 1:32AM MST until January 11 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...In Montana, Bighorn Canyon and Southern Big Horn. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick. The slick conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Falling temperatures will combine with winds to produce wind chills of zero to 10 below zero tonight and Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
